title: (x) Germany 2006 World Cup logo - Welcome (proprietary face, see Trivia) {Rainer}
content:
Hi!

I am trying to determine the font used for the “GERMANY” on the official World Cup emblem.

Grateful, as always, for some help.

Matt Atherton

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [germany.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060703164019/http:/typophile.com/files/germany.jpg) | 18.52 KB |
author: fluiddruid23

comments.content: This is custom, named [Welcome](http://web.archive.org/web/20060703164019/http:/www.whitestone.ac/clients/2006/typeface.htm). Not available to the public for some obviuos sponsoring reasons. Nice substitute is [Trivia](http://web.archive.org/web/20060703164019/http:/www.fontshop.de/sukr.php3?searchtype=fo-kw&fsdsess=&ch=search.php3&fl=y&searchtext=trivia) from Henning Krause at Fontshop.de.

Fantastic!

I’ll go take a look. Many thanks!

Matt

Aber gerne…

And as you speak german, you could havee a look at the comparison of Welcome and Trivia at Nick Blumes Weblog [guillemet.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20060703164019/http:/guillemets.de/weblog/trivia-welcome-vergleich)
